title: 日本ダービーにむけて

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Huh, Rice-san, are you nervous?
Your face is stiff. Are you okay?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Eh, ah, um...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: ...Today, I really want to catch up to Bourbon-san...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: But... when I saw Bourbon-san's figure, I froze up. ...Can I win?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: You can win!!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Eh.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: You can win! Because you worked so hard even with your shoes all worn out!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Even if you don't win, today's race should be great experience for winning next time.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...Actually, I always think something like that before races. Hehe.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
So anyway, it's fine!
It's fine, Rice-san!
As if drawn in by Matikanetannhauser's smile, Rice Shower's expression gradually softened.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: ...Tannhauser-san.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Yeah... thank you...!
Rice will do her best...!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
...Ah, I mean, sorry...!
Even though Tannhauser-san is also racing, I only talked about Bourbon-san...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Huh? No, no, that's only natural.
I mean, it's Bourbon-san~!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Speaking of which, look, talk of the devil and he shall appear!
Let's go ahead and declare war in one shot while we're at it!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Declare war...!?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Words have power!
Come on, come on, go for it!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Y-yes...!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
...?
Why is Tannhauser-san hiding over there...?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ah, ah, um, Bourbon-san!!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Yes?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
T-today... please take care of me!
Rice... will catch up to you, Bourbon-san!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: ...Rice-san.
Mihono Bourbon firmly grasped Rice Shower's trembling right hand in return.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Likewise.
I can't afford to lose to you either.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, yeah yeah!
Rice-san, you did great!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: But from the perspective of someone who's been watching since the 'Satsuki Sho', it's an indescribably moving sight!
I'd forgotten, but indeed, during the 'Satsuki Sho' too, she was lurking at the edge of the underground passageway, trying to stay out of the way as Mihono Bourbon psyched herself up.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh? Well, that's because, you know, I thought I might be in the way.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: For example, you know, during the climax of a movie, when rivals share a passionate handshake—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: An ordinary person doesn't just barge in between them, right?
You're a capable and important Umamusume.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: No, no, not at all. You'll get called a trainer fanatic instead of a parent fanatic.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Well, that's not important right now! More importantly, look—
Matikanetannhauser slowly began groping the air with her right hand.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hmm~. Around here!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: An air handshake!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Hey!
What's with that look!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Because, you know, to live up to the chairman's expectations,
I need to be fired up, it's important!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
I'm just an ordinary Umamusume, but
the chairman has expectations for me too——

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ……Huh?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: No, well, it's just, it's a bit late to ask, but…….

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Why does she have expectations for me,
and not Bourbon-san?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
If it's about guiding someone or something like that,
wouldn't Bourbon-san be better?
Even Rice-san is being guided by her.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
……Well, whatever!
Right now, focus on the race!

With various things on her mind……
the 'Japanese Derby' has begun!
